ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will have a very pleasant life
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So he shall have an agreeable life
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he shall find himself in a life of bliss;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will have a pleasant life
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He is therefore in the desired serenity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, he shall be in a life, well-pleasing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So he shall be in a life of pleasure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So he shall be in a pleasing life
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then he will be in blissful state
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so he will live in a state of Bliss
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he shall be in a life well-pleasing -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So he will have a pleasant life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And he will be in a life of Bliss,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So he shall be in a life, well-pleasing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: His shall be a pleasing life
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So he will be in pleasant living.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So he will be in a pleasant life -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:21] So he will enjoy a pleasant living,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then he will be in blissful state) he will be in a life with which he is pleased, i.e. a pleasing life.
